hiveArticle.title: Seek the light and find a way - Part 3
hiveArticle.body:
### Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
###

**Akhand Diya** - Akhand Diya is been used by devotees in the festival which will burn throughout the day and night. The meaning of Akhand Diya is simple that to never lose hope even in worst circumstances just like the little Diya lights even the darkest places. Let's the light bring knowledge in our life just like the small Diya / candle brings life to the darkness. 

Let's all hope that light should bring happiness and hope to each and every individual through out the world.
